rendering.macro.task.name=Task Macro rendering.macro.task.description=Create a task that you can assign an user to using the mention macro and use the date macro to set a deadline! rendering.macro.task.parameter.completed.name=Is the task done? rendering.macro.task.parameter.completed.description=Denotes whether the task has been completed or not. rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.name=ID rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the task, relative to the current page. rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.name=Creator rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.description=The user that created the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.name=Creation date rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.description=The date when the task was created. rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.name=Completion date rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.description=The date when the task was completed.
rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.name=Task report macro rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.description=Create a custom report of the tasks within the wiki. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.pages.name=Pages filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.pages.description=Display the tasks found inside the specified pages or in their children. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.tags.name=Tags filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.tags.description=Display only the tasks that are found on pages that have at least one these tags. This field should be a comma separated list of tags. e.g. "tech,blog,programming". rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.assignees.name=Assignees filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.assignees.description=Filter the tasks by their assigned users. The report will display the tasks that have at least one of their assignees in the users specified. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.creators.name=Creator filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.creators.description=Filter the tasks by the creator. The report will display the tasks created by the users specified. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.createdAfter.name=Creation date filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.createdAfter.description=Display all the tasks created after the specified date. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.completed.name=Completion filter rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.completed.description=Display all the tasks that are either done or still in progress. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.limit.name=Live table limit rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.limit.description=Specifies how many tasks should be displayed on a single page. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.columns.name=Live table display columns rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.columns.description=A list task properties that you want the table to display. The possible values are: description, deadline, assignee, doc.title (task location) and completeDate. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.sortBy.name=Sort By rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.sortBy.description=The column that will be used to order the table. rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.id.name=Table ID rendering.macro.tasks-report-macro.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the table. If the field is not completed, a random ID will be assigned.
